title: Hello, I am Ashita 👋🏽
text:
Hello, I am Ashita 👋🏽


I’m a (work-in-progress) Data Scientist.




About me


I am a Master of Data Science student at University of British Columbia in Vancouver, Canada.   My interest in data science began during my undergraduate degree in Business Information Technology Management - Artificial Intelligence Management (BITMAN-AI) at British Columbia Institute of Technology.   I am driven by the potential of data to drive positive change. I aim to promote transparency and data-driven decision-making, helping businesses develop informed strategies that benefit both departments and the organization as a whole.


This website reflects my creativity and commitment to continuous learning in both my professional and personal life.



  My Journey So Far
